Articles.Content: I want to downgrade KSP to verison 0.18.0. In this Forum I have already found versions 0.7.3 to 0.13, but not more. Can someone give me the download link please? thx

All updates .14 and above are paid versions of the game, and thus cannot be shared. So there really isn't a way for you to downgrade until Squad creates a way to download any version.

Edited December 13, 2014 by RocketPilot573
Out of curiosity, why do you wish to play 0.18?

I believe the demo is version 0.18 (or very close to it), though handicapped in some ways. There is also a thread buried somewhere on the forum that has links to many of the old free versions.

I'm sure you're going to get this question several times, but what are you trying to accomplish with downgrading? We might be able to help you do what you're trying to accomplish without regressing.

Cheers,

~Claw

I want to downgrade KSP to verison 0.18.0. In this Forum I have already found versions 0.7.3 to 0.13, but not more. Can someone give me the download link please? thx

Here's the link (with replies) from last time you posted a "downgrade KSP" thread.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/100289-Downgrade-KSP

You can't downgrade to 0.18 unless you've a zip tucked away somewhere from a store download. And even then it'd be so far out of date it'd be almost unusuable with mods etc.

There Is no way to legally do this, because distribution of paid KSP Breaks the eula. However you can backup your install folder that way everything is preserved And just run the KSP.exe to play in the backup folder

Edited December 14, 2014 by Dooz
